page.title: 14Watford: Religion 2
page.content:
In addition to the christian churches, the last decade has seen the rise of two other major religions in Watford, which are expected over the next decade to overtake christian worship as the majority perceived religion in Watford.
The Muslim community has just opened a new mosque (Suni). The Shi'ite branch have their own place of worship.
Sikhism is also very strong in Watford and represents the third major group.
Other groups, such as the Jewish community and Greek orthodox tend to travel outside Watford to worship.
